scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend:dev" "npm run web:dev" "npm run mobile:dev"
scripts.build: npm run backend:build && npm run web:build && npm run mobile:build
scripts.test: npm run backend:test && npm run web:test && npm run mobile:test
scripts.lint: npm run backend:lint && npm run web:lint && npm run mobile:lint
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../web && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install && cd ../ai && npm install && cd ../blockchain && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && npm run docker:build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.staging.yml up -d
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && npm run docker:build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.production.yml up -d
